author: Simon Difford
description: A hearty drink that's best suited to a winter's night – perhaps a night with little food as it's something of a meal in itself.
name: Colleen Bawn
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BEAT egg and pour into shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass
